website_summaries.verdict: The best value yet in the GeForce RTX 20-series lineup, the RTX 2060 is a worthy, if more expensive, successor to the venerable GTX 1060.
pros: Faster than the GeForce GTX 1070 for less money
cons: Unlike Nvidia RTX 2060 Founders Edition, lacks a VirtualLink USB Type-C port
Priced higher than the GeForce GTX 1060 it replaces
8GB of video memory would have been ideal

customer_reviews.title: 2060 AMP 6G Zotac
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. AMP 2060 seems to be very stable , very low noise, didn't see it going above 71 degrees (only when scaling above 1080p programmatically to 4k). Very performant fps-wise. Good price too. Tried all new games and FPS is always 60+ on top specs. I would def recommend to anyone who wants a decent performance for £329.
customer_reviews.author: Rus

customer_reviews.title: Great price/performance for 1440p ultra!
customer_reviews.text: Using it for 1440p gaming and I'm so glad I bought this card. When there's so many options out there for only slight difference improve, it was tough to decide (1660 ti, 2060 being two options). The zotac comes with a 3 year warranty which increases to 5 years if you register it online, which is much longer than the usual 2/3 years! Runs pretty mich every game at (or really close to) max (ultra) settings at 1440p, with it getting a little loud on the latest releases (but can't be heard over the game). Would recommend this card.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan James

customer_reviews.title: Zotac Geforce 2060 Twin fan 6G Graphics card.
customer_reviews.text: I run a lot of VR games and all I wanted was a card that would run 99% of VR titles, I was fed up with my old graphics card (RX 480) forever blue screening and some games unplayable like Carnival games and a few others, installed the Zotac Geforce 2060 which was very easy and bingo! All the games in my library are now up and running with no problems whatsoever, overclockable with the free msi afterburner software if required but mine runs fine as is, a good reasonably quiet and very stable card, the other thing is with its small dimensions its ideally suited for the smaller desktop tower PC.
customer_reviews.author: Mandemfmp

customer_reviews.title: Bad product experience. Maybe just mine.
customer_reviews.text: Currently always running at 83 degrees on games. Poor cooling and is very noisy. The item should be avoided at all cost, after nearly running out of my warranty the item has began to break. The DP has completely broke. This item will not last and is of very poor quality. Spend a little more for a proper card.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent graphics cards, very happy. Bought it to better run VR games for Oculus Rift, and it improved performance massively.
customer_reviews.author: Davy

customer_reviews.title: It's great! but it needs fan stop
customer_reviews.text: This card runs great, gets 1080p 144hz in most of my games at medium-high White LED is fairly monochrome and fits in well with my PC Doesn't overheat, and temperatures are pretty good However, with it being on my desk, i can hear the GPU fans spinning faster than other fans when idle, because they HAVE to run at a minimum of 40% Wish Zotac included a fan-stop feature in an update
customer_reviews.author: Ish

customer_reviews.title: Very good upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it on sale for 299 pounds, to upgrade my aging RX480. This is definitely a good upgrade, the card is silent and perform so much better than the last one. Another nice note, I think I had a winner on the silicon lottery as I was able to do a substantial override on the core clock and the memory clock.
customer_reviews.author: xxPEPE666xx

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about a month ago. Even though people had problems, it works perfectly for me. This card is the perfect upgrade if you want to play all AAA titles at sixty FPS or above and you also want the rtx technology without spending a fortune. Do your own research and see what card suits YOU best of course. This is simply my subjective opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money at 1080p or 1440p
customer_reviews.text: Really good high mid end or low high end graphics card perfect for 1080p or 1440p gaming. Runs all my games without issue and at a good framerate. Install was easy too. Not suitable for people looking for GPU's capable of 4K gaming or serious ray tracing. Overall a good card that provides better value for money than the GTX 2070.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Great card, REALLY quiet
customer_reviews.text: Whilst this is great card that does everything it says it will the one key thing that stands out for me is how quiet it is even when I mess around and drive it up to 100% utilisation
customer_reviews.author: Derek GC White

customer_reviews.title: great price to performance.
customer_reviews.text: i bought it as a returned and slightly used item w damaged packaging for 313 pounds. the price to performance is amazing. the cooler isn't that noisy, but it always could be more silent tho
customer_reviews.author: szaszimi

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: good tools to adjust monitors great for games super quiet just great
customer_reviews.author: NPC6298567

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Minor modifications and configuration required to set up and get working, but fantastic card for the price. Solid so far
customer_reviews.author: TuvbsuC

customer_reviews.title: Killer GPU
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic GPU. Paired with a Ryzen 5 2600 its a 1080p/60fps beast, 1440p is no problem either.
customer_reviews.author: WickWah

customer_reviews.title: Very good card for the price
customer_reviews.text: A very good upgrade from my 2060 and zotac overclocking software is very easy to use. The 5 year warranty is great aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetdreams

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great graphics card for the price and runs all games at 1080p max settings paired with my ryzen 2600 cpu. Also runs extremely quiet and cool which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

product_meta.title: ZOTAC GPU NV RTX2060 AMP 6G Fan
product_meta.description: Style Name:RTX 2060 AMPThe all-new generation of ZOTAC GAMING GeForce graphics cards are here. The powerful new GeForce RTX 2060 takes advantage of the cutting-edge NVIDIA Turing architecture to immerse you in incredible realism and performance in the latest games. The future of gaming starts here.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars106 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
